bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Combined Designation of PCs brought forth by a disease evil abiding at a specific location in the body and impairing its normal functioning. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry she gan 射干：主咳逆上氣 , 喉痹咽痛 , 不得消息 , 散結氣 , 腹中邪逆 , “It controls coughing with counterflow, i.e. rising qi, throat blockage with gullet pain that cannot be dissolved. It disperses bound qi, and evil counterflow in the abdomen”. The term also appears in later quotes, including Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 , of four passages from the Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 and Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 . There is no known definition of its meaning in any text. The definition given here is tentative; it is based on the four quotes in the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 .
